actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to expand the work opportunity tax credit to include long-term unemployed individuals.
short_title: Back to Work Tax Credit Act

summary.text: Back to Work Tax Credit Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow employers a work opportunity tax credit for hiring long-term unemployed individuals. Defines "long-term unemployed individual" as an individual certified as receiving federal or state unemployment compensation for not less than 26 consecutive weeks during the one-year period ending on the hiring date.

titles.title: Back to Work Tax Credit Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to expand the work opportunity tax credit to include long-term unemployed individuals.
